title: Crick Crack, Monkey - Tantie considers narrator's

content.question: It can be inferred from the end of paragraph 4 through paragraph 5 (“But when . . . at-all’ ”) that Tantie considers the narrator’s behavior to be

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
